name: A Door I’ll Never Enter
description: @TheHCTurk • For connoisseurs of originality and creativity. I have rendered the entire text of one of my novels as a single image. 60,000 words, 340,000 characters, 18,246 x 23,613 pixels. The proportions are that of a letter-size sheet of paper, but the size is HUGE. It would print 61 x 79 inches @300dpi (the typeface is Letter Gothic 10).  Story: A cross-genre literary novel of contemporary fantasy, magic realism, and jaw-dropping hilarity, A Door I’ll Never Enter follows the adventures of Bill, Jane, Dan, and their interstellar comet (disguised as a watermelon) as they travel from kitchen sink to cannibal canoe in search of a Leprechaun’s pot of FAIL. Finding friendship on the way, they learn that failure might be best when the goal is global destruction.
